data.text: What is the difference between aircraft technician and aircraft mechanic? How to get a job in aviation and is it really true that you fall in love with aviation for life? Find out the answers in the latest interview with our technician Vladislavs. https://t.co/xsvOBm4vGJ https://t.co/AC6xbZFm3g

@Joenpla1 Hello! Thanks for participating and your tweet! There are conflicting reports as indeed some sources are saying that there might be one additional "main" island! However we went with the count from OECD!

#airBalticQuiz is back! 🤗 This week we have announced a new, beautiful and rather exotic destination – Tenerife, which is one of the Canary Islands. 🏝 Do you know how many main islands there are in this archipelago?

@kaspars_fa Saprotam Jūsu sarūgtinājumu, taču, kā jau rakstījām iepriekšējā tvītā, aicinām izmēģināt ar citu pārlūkprogrammu. Ja problēma joprojām pastāv (un tā nav bijusi īslaicīga vienreizēja problēma, piemēram lapai neielādējoties), lūdzam mums sūtīt DM ziņu ar sīkākām detaļām!

@kaspars_fa Labdien! Pēc ekrānšāviņa izskatās, ka problēma ir jau bankas pusē. Vai izmantojot citu pārlūkprogrammu, vai citu maksājumu metodi, novērojat tādu pašu problēmu? Ja jā, lūdzam mums sūtīt DM ziņu ar sīkākām detaļām, pētīsim! Paldies!

@Jana_Or_Lova Labdien, Jana. Visi mūsu vēstkopas e-pasti par šobrīd pieejamajiem galamērķiem ir informatīvi, un tajos arī ir norādīts, ka ceļošana šobrīd iespējama tikai neatliekamas nepieciešamības gadījumā (piemēram darbs, mācības, ģimenes apvienošanās, atgriešanās mājās, u.c.).

Due to the historical negative impact caused by the pandemic, airBaltic group closed 2020 with a revenue of EUR 143 million, which was 72% less than the year before. Despite the severe travel restrictions, airBaltic carried 1.34 million passengers: https://t.co/NaUrZfGy67 https://t.co/SZERaZkbDT

Šis ir stāsts par Lienes Svokas ģimeni - to, kā pandēmija viņu nošķīra no vīra, bet ar @airBaltic gādību abi atkal varēja satikties. Esam patiesi priecīgi, ka bijām un esam #SavienotiArPasauli, ka varējām palīdzēt Lienes ģimenei atgriezties mājās. https://t.co/utTNpSQ9uk https://t.co/5fTAj2LePO

Great news for passengers who seek a guaranteed holiday in the sun! Starting on September 2, we plan to launch new scheduled flights between Riga and Tenerife in Spain. We'll fly to the largest island in the Canary Islands archipelago three times weekly: https://t.co/ZF8w4IKQ9I https://t.co/vkzzkKwx54

data.text: @James220201 Hello! Currently not, however in the future - everything is possible! We kindly advise you to follow all of the actual information in regards to the newest additions to our route map on our social media accounts and https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg! 😊 Thank you.

Starting of June 4, we'll be performing two weekly flights between Riga and Edinburgh. The aesthetically pleasing capital of Scotland is worth exploring - from the majestic buildings and gardens to countless of fascinating museums. data.text: A bird's-eye view of @Airbus A220-300! https://t.co/MWiUZQ0gWb

Take a look at some of the sustainability goals reached in the past months with February being the month of peace, justice, and strong institutions and March standing for goals to help the environment. Read more about our sustainability: https://t.co/j8BUHxKHvM https://t.co/3L6MI7k34U

Scenic and authentic is what characterize our new destination Naples! Lying on one of the most beautiful bays in Italy, this rough diamond will surprise you with plenty of art, history and incredible Italian food. Two weekly flights will start on June 4. https://t.co/DfQnlMKHS9 https://t.co/GILewcI2PE

Lidmašīnu astes mākoņos ļauj saglabāt cerību daudziem, īpaši cilvēkiem, kuriem nepieciešami medicīnas pakalpojumi ārvalstīs. Mēs runājām ar @bernuslimnica un mūsu klienti Larisu, lai atklātu, cik nozīmīga ir apziņa, ka esam #SavienotiArPasauli https://t.co/TCMhzdSO8p https://t.co/g0MvLPcsiT

We spoke with @bernuslimnica and our client Larisa who revealed the importance of knowing that you can still fly with @airBaltic if the need arises. Read the story behind the ticket to find out why #ConnectivityIsEssential: https://t.co/qTtZjCzhsL https://t.co/ysCpE1ZJth

@LArtour Labdien, Artūr! Visos mūsu lidojumos tiek pārvadātas kravas - sākot ar pastu, īpašiem Cargo sūtījumiem un... beidzot ar Ziemassvētku dāvanām! :)
https://t.co/804sQfmZa6

Excited to expand our leisure destinations list with the picture postcard perfect Greek island Santorini. Let's visit the white washed cliff-side towns and go chasing the magical sunsets. As of June 5, we plan to connect Riga and Santorini once a week ✈️ https://t.co/diTZrYce0C https://t.co/DIsNyg48DY

data.text: We are thrilled to announce that we will become the world’s first airline to issue non-fungible tokens! We will issue collector #NFTs showcasing @Airbus A220-300 as well as a piece of art of one of the most beloved Latvian cities: https://t.co/Sj83vib243 #blockchain #cryptoart https://t.co/mJp4I6J1Gp

We have a new destination on our route map - it's Heraklion, the capital of Greek island of Crete. A very popular holiday destination with picturesque streets and artifacts that attract history enthusiasts. Two weekly flights will start as of May 15. https://t.co/reCVC7dMuW https://t.co/8mhklPYk26

data.text: @no_1fanny Hello! Thanks for your message. Please accept our apologies for flight cancellation. Yes, you can - if your ticket was purchased via our web page, please contact our Reservations department - our colleagues will assist: reservations@airbaltic.com; https://t.co/UWa844vRzD

We are looking for a Non-Destructive Testing Inspector and Non-Destructive Testing Apprenticeship to join our team and become future detectives of the manufacturing world ensuring safety and reliability of various aircraft parts. Apply here: https://t.co/nEodx4AUEv https://t.co/Efbg9EfiXG

We are pleased to expand our connectivity and offer our travellers a new destination – enchanting and luxurious Dubai in United Arab Emirates! The new flights will be performed four times weekly starting this September: https://t.co/9FS2xILSxg https://t.co/fr795G1Lrn

Join us today, on March 24, at 12.00 (GMT)/14.00 (Riga time) in the public webinar by @Gaussm, the President and CEO of airBaltic. To join the event, please click here: https://t.co/M0iIGOuqUf https://t.co/zJzQLi2iEX

data.text: @kristineberz @Gaussm On top of that, our Airbus A220-300 aircraft are equipped with modern environmental control system. Airflow is supplied from above the overhead compartment flowing towards the floor, eliminating airflow along the cabin to minimize the air transmission amongst passengers.

@kristineberz @Gaussm Good morning! Thanks for your message. As long as there are enough free seats in the flights, we are doing our best to leave an empty seat next to each passenger. If this is not possible for all passengers, families and groups are seated together.

data.text: This year during Easter we will offer flights to more than 30 destinations. We constantly monitor the situation in our destinations and for now, we welcome on board those passengers who must travel for essential and urgent reasons only: https://t.co/ZSYGL7q0tN https://t.co/lkX2Gc7VJw

Our airline is more than just taking passengers from point A to B. More than a thousand local and international professionals. More than 400 high-tech positions. More smoothness and more safety while taking you to the places you need the most. https://t.co/0lnWpfL5XS

On March 24, we will be hosting a live webinar where CEO @Gaussm will give a clear overview of how the airline is flying out of the crisis, how the company works during these unprecedented times, and what is planned for the future. Learn more: https://t.co/z9t0vLrogU https://t.co/UdnRI3zTFJ

Thanks for participating! 🤗 Exactly 50% of you tapped the right answer! Pilots used to carry a surprisingly heavy weight of 10 – 15 kg with them just to ensure that all of the necessary flight documents are in the reach of their hands.

Spēcīga, starptautiski atzīta un pelnoša lidsabiedrība ir vērtīgs ieguvums ekonomikai. Nacionālā lidsabiedrība sniedz ieguvumus dažādām nozarēm un sabiedrības daļām, nodrošinot transporta savienojamību, darbu un izglītību. Uzzini vairāk: https://t.co/duvNs62ykI https://t.co/Tmukl0xe8X

A strong, profitable and internationally respected airline is a valuable asset for the economy. National carrier benefits various industries and communities, providing connectivity, resources and education. Learn more: https://t.co/kKWOtZCI29 https://t.co/FwVAzqnLhM

data.text: Hey, #airBalticQuiz! We just introduced you with a new project of electronic operational flight plans. Back in 2014 airBaltic implemented iPads for pilots, allowing them to avoid carrying heavy packages of important flight documents. 🗃 Can you guess how heavy they used to be? 🤔

How the new strategy has changed airline's business going forward? Read @flightradar24 interview with @airBaltic CEO @Gaussm to learn more of how the industry will shape up in years to come. https://t.co/VHGYeLfAZV

data.text:
@IATA Thanks for participating! Almost all of you (84%) were correct and chose the right answer - the official 2 letter IATA designator code of airBaltic is BT! You can also see it on our flight numbers! ✈️
But now let's jump right into this week - have a great one! 🤗

The commitment index of @airBaltic employees, which the company has been measuring quarterly for six years, reached 71 index points (out of 100) for the first time in history during the most recent survey carried out in last quarter of 2020. Read more: https://t.co/lR31aFcnWn https://t.co/XggJRqsZbh

data.text:
Sunny Friday here in Riga calls for new #airBalticQuiz! Let's go to basics for this one. Airline identifies itself with a special 2 letter code which are assigned by the International Air Transport Association (@IATA). ✈️ 
Do you know the code for us? 🤓
@Milnoc @Airbus Fingers crossed! We will wait for you on board soon! ✈️🤗

data.text: Packed with innovation and passion, our fleet is one of the most modern and environmentally friendly in Europe. Take a look at what advantages you get when flying the magnificent @Airbus A220-300: https://t.co/qvVH0tRvjy https://t.co/TlTYCqNFPa

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: We're among the first airlines in the world to trial the global @IATA Travel Pass solution for cross border travel. This mobile app will help passengers to manage their travel easily in line with government requirements for COVID-19 tests or vaccines. https://t.co/o1VCb6Ykue https://t.co/EiM0Uick4M

#DidYouKnow that airBaltic currently has 24 codeshare partners? It is an agreement between two airlines, where one operates the flight and other markets this flight and issue tickets for it. This gives our passengers broader route network and better connectivity for flights. https://t.co/Ikh0CS9SnW

urls.title: Cancel your flight | airBaltic
urls.description: Get more information about: refund options depending on the ticket type you have purchased or are planning to purchase; our sickness warranty option; and travel insurance.

data.text:
@anj75000 Hello! If your flights are still scheduled as planned the refund policy depends on the ticket type you have selected (GREEN, GREEN plus, GREEN classic or BUSINESS). More detailed information in regards to this is available on our web page: https://t.co/HQ1tsTHg7P
Thank you!
Thanks for participating! Majority of you (76%) picked the right answer - the aviation summer season this year starts on March 28th! Have you found your sunglasses? 😎

Weekend and #airBalticQuiz is here! We can finally feel the spring hanging around the corner, which means that the official start of the summer season in aviation is not that far away. ☀️ Can you guess when it starts this year?
@amjaliks Saule austot/rietot mēdz radīt pavisam citas nokrāsas... 🙃

data.text:
#DidYouKnow that since we painted one of our A220-300 in the motives of Estonian flag, it has performed 2060 flights, carrying the symbol and the name of its capital across the world! 
Happy Independence Day, Estonia! 🇪🇪

📸 by Vilnius Airport https://t.co/ETbDWK0R7p
@skazis_ Labvakar, Jurģi! Vai varam lūgt sīkākas detaļas par Jūsu rezervāciju privātā vēstulē? Pārbaudīsim! Paldies!
@therigaspotter https://t.co/TmEw038sZy
A bit more than a half (52%) chose the right answer! 😊 The Technical Department is the second-largest and ensures that the aircraft are properly maintained. Any guesses for the largest department? 🤔

data.text: @inucis Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. May we kindly ask to contact us via DM here in Twitter regarding the existing vouchers? We'll be glad to assist. Thank you!

@AivarsTennisUK Hello! Currently not, however who knows what the future might bring... 😎🤔
Stay safe as well!
It’s #airBalticQuiz time! This week we introduced you with our technician Oskars from the technical department. 🔧 Can you guess whether this department at airBaltic is:

data.text: @ftpxay Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us! Our kind advise would be to contact us privately here on Twitter in regards to this. Thank you!

urls.title: airBaltic piedāvā plašu apmaksas veidu klāstu
urls.description: Vai zināji, ka aviobiļešu apmaksu vari veikt daļās? Pasažieriem piedāvājam dažādas apmaksas iespējas. Uzzini par tām te, airBaltic.com

data.text: @oskarsvizbulis @Gircha Joprojām ļauj! Sīkākas detaļas par maksājumu metodēm: https://t.co/Q8VK5PHh34

data.text:
With our new codeshare partner @lufthansa, we are offering convenient access to a worldwide network. Tickets via Frankfurt and Munich to many cities in Germany and other European countries are available on @airBaltic website.
✈️ See the options here: https://t.co/eLg5lfhyxR https://t.co/4b1s9eOLIl

We deliver. We care. We grow. These are the core values that we stand for. They serve as our compass and guide all of our actions, behaviors and decision-making process every day. Learn more of what lies at the heart of our brand: https://t.co/Nkmz2SYQUS https://t.co/8TJQEwGLSc

#DidYouKnow that the 'Flight turnaround' starts when the aircraft arrives at a terminal gate and end when it departs from the gate. Speed, efficiency, and accuracy are the most important aspects in the ground-handling process, with the main focus being on flight safety! https://t.co/pE7PCazlrC

We spent a day with our composite technician Oskars. Watch the video to find out why he’s called the microsurgeon of aviation! Learn more about our technical department: https://t.co/4bT0t3bFY5 https://t.co/lPWYw7pESm

data.text: We're happy to announce a codeshare agreement between @lufthansa and @airBaltic. Our customers will benefit from convenient access to a worldwide network, while Lufthansa passengers will have more possibilities to travel from Munich to the Baltic states. https://t.co/jdpHCReMWP https://t.co/YPWpN0GtjB
